response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me, but I am confident it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or business, given its worth of $1,500,000 to you.

I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price tailored to your needs. Considering the significant value it holds for both of us, I propose a price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while maximizing the value for you.

Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase. I am here to answer any questions or provide further details about the product to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
